name: CQ.Ext.KeyNav
doc:
Provides a convenient wrapper for normalized keyboard navigation.  KeyNav allows you to bind
navi...

configs.name: defaultEventAction
configs.doc: The method to call on the CQ.Ext.EventObject after this KeyNav intercepts a key. Valid values are...

configs.name: disabled
configs.doc: True to disable this KeyNav instance (defaults to false)

configs.name: forceKeyDown
configs.doc: Handle the keydown event instead of keypress (defaults to false). KeyNav automatically does this ...

methods.name: destroy
methods.doc: Destroy this KeyNav (this is the same as calling disable).

methods.name: setDisabled
methods.doc: Convenience function for setting disabled/enabled by boolean.
